description: Works, is easy to use, and faster than using a website.
summary: Does exactly what it aims to do in a fast and simple way

description:
Works and is easy to use, which I like a lot. But there are some things that it does not do yet
- While it gives you all possible short routes, it sometimes has overlapping routes. For example if Bus A and Bus B leave at the same station, but bus B later, it shows me "Take bus A and then B at the train station" instead of just waiting for A. 
- Could use some color
- Could use gnome-style Icon
